name: dominion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] control over a country or people: God has dominion over (= controls) all his creatures. Napoleon dreamed of achieving global dominion.
[ C ] the land that belongs to a ruler: The chief's son would inherit all his dominions. The Hanoverian monarchs wanted to protect their German dominions from Prussia.
[ C ] a country that belonged in the past to the British Empire: They asked whether the future of Canada was to be a dominion within the British Empire. In former British dominions like India, Singapore, and Hong Kong, imperialism has left a lasting legacy.
